mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_STATUS='Y'

SELECT PRODUCT_NO, BOOTH_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_DETAIL, PRODUCT_STOCK, PRODUCT_STATUS, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_IMG_ON, PRODUCT_IMG_FP, BOOTH_NAME FROM PRODUCT JOIN BOOTH USING(BOOTH_NO) JOIN COMPANY ON(USER_NO = COM_NO) WHERE PRODUCT_STATUS='Y' ORDER BY PRODUCT_ENROLLDATE DESC
